lines.text: For what? What's the plan here, man? You're really far away from anything fucking nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch him close off as you start saying that. He catches himself saying too much information. His demeanor goes cold.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Please, we know you're going to transport to another plane.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're trying to bail, aren't you? Were you trying to run?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, he's joining the fight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, he was going to leave.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, he's clearly clamming up. I put my hand back over the front of his face, I take the other one, put it on the back of his face, and I start making my fingers touch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (muffled groaning) He reaches up and grabs the small symbol, familiar loop with the fork above it. He clasps it in his hand and doesn't resist.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you want it?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah! Put him a little lower, Grog. I rip off the necklace.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's like clasping it in his hand. Make a strength check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Drop it! Drop it!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh my god, we're so terrible!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are we?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Natural 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (muffled panic)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We'll give it back! You've got to answer some questions for us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, he won't. Look away if you want to preserve anything, and I just squish his head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're saying that, you watch as one eye opens and his hands go limp and then (face exploding) and it just (splattering).

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Grog

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Spray on Pike.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I thought you were me giving the signal like, end it!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No! I was going to-- whatever.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right. We'll work on it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We'll find another one. It's okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'm really sorry. Sorry.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Brains!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pike got Dragon Aged.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there a water bucket around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So, but, set fire to the house, right? Burn the whole city down?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The city is mostly stone; I don't know if we can burn it down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're having this conversation, you do find a small basin that's filled up with water. The people that live in this city still need to live. It looks like there are the means of feeding and drinking, though you get the sense that they may or may not-- most of the supplies do come from outside the Shadowfell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's poison the water supply!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I take a little bit of the water and control it and let Pike wash off a little bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think I got a little in my mouth (gagging).

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait, there's a little bit of skull right there. All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's the little chunk where the joint is. It's just this little bit, it just breaks naturally if you put pressure on that side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's this slumped pile of dark cloth, thin body, and Riki-Oh mess on the ground.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughs) Wow! Way to bring that back!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, what's the plan, guys?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We've got a little shadow creature coming back around in a moment.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Want to jump on and do a scouting pass?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You guys do the scout, we'll heal?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You guys, are we not going to do a Heroes' Feast?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's an hour. It takes an hour, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can't risk it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do you think's going to happen in an hour? Everything's going to kick off in an hour?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wouldn't you hate to miss it by 15 minutes?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The pulse has gotten stronger since we've been here. I don't know if that pulse means it's about to go, or if the pulse means that it's five minutes in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This guy was about to leave his house to go walk over there for the final part of the ritual.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or he was trying to bail before the final part of the ritual.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where's your pet? Let's go find some shit out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He had rations! No one takes rations!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He was handing out weapons.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was like Carpentry of the Damned sort of thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What if the giant orb has to reach the crystals?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It might, but it might just do the (buzzing, exploding).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Technical terms.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, the (buzzing, exploding).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's magic, it's the best I've got.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who's going up?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Me and Vax.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just you two, okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How's everybody doing right now?

lines.name: TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: I'm a little rough.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I could use 20 points.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I could use 20 points.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Let's do a little Mass Cure Wounds situation.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But do it with a flair! (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, fudge.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What? Oh that's a one, not seven, isn't it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's fine, that's fine!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're taking a short rest; I can add my--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you guys taking a short rest?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, while they fly up, is it enough time for the people staying in the house to heal a bit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys could take a short rest during that time, if you want to do a full scoping. By the time you come back, that spell's about to fade.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, yeah, we're going to go as fast as we can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So those that are traveling can't take a short rest.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And if that fades, he's fully aware that he was dominated, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well. You don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. Especially me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you especially don't know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Time's a-wasting, Scanlan, let's go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go. Mr. Mistoffelees!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you open the door, there, just landing (landing) (gloom stalker croaking). You guys climb onto its back?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, we do!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You feel like you're plunging your arms into it, but you find purchase within that shadow and hold on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll need to spoon for warmth.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I nestle in behind Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I gladly accept.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's ride.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's ride?! (laughing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so, as you guys take up into the sky, and you guys are taking your short rest, we're going to take a quick break on our end as well. Use the restroom, get a snack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're taking a break?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're taking a break here because it is 8:30. We are going to do another giveaway at the break here, a Wyrmwood giveaway. A fantastic flamebox elder hero vault, which is some of the prettiest wood that they make.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe the prettiest Wyrmwood box ever.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How come we didn't ever see those before; is that a new wood?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't know. But it's cool!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello, everyone, and welcome back to Critical Role.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We missed you, too, guys.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I forget, and then I remember to do it, and then we're already on the air.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so as the rest of you are taking a short rest, the two of you are making your way, as stealthily as you can, on the back of a gloom stalker as it encircles the exterior of the Castle Entropis. First off, I would like you both to make a stealth check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I squeeze the gnome tighter.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god. I think you're out of range, so you don't get the plus ten anymore.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's okayish.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You have advantage, though, on everything.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 34. A low 34.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you guys begin to circle the exterior of the tower, making a wide spiral along its exterior. You make your way up. It's hard to gauge the full height of this tower, but it's at least six or seven stories tall, if not taller. I want you both to make perception checks, please.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Now that we're closer, I'm looking for windows that she might not have been close enough to see. Doors, holes, anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, sir.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Natural one! I'm under his body.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's curled up within Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're just within.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It really just depends on the day. 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26. Okay. No windows. It is a solid tower, completely around as you cycle around. As you get towards the top of it, you notice the three curved fingerlike spires that curl up at the top and the pulsing of the energy. You watch as these very faint tendrils of magical energy that you've tuned in to be able to see better, now that you know what to look for, are all-- from this height, you can see the long strands are undulating and shifting, almost like the very winds of the land are causing them to rotate. You can see the variations in their form, but they're all still merging and entwining at the very top of Entropis. You see nothing. You can see what appear to be a cluster of about 30 or so figures all gathered along the top of this. You can see what appear to be three glowing spheres in a triangular pattern around this that are accepting the tether of the magical energy, and then suffusing what appears to be a small altar of some kind in the very center of the top of this tower.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Mother bitch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (music changes)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (quietly) How does he do that? How did you do that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You also watch as about 25 or so of these figures at the top all collapse at once.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But some are left.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are some left. You watch and very faintly, you can see on that altar in the center, there is a small bead of pure, vibrant, bright white light. You watch as a robed figure that previously was held in the shadows emerge. You're too far away to make any more details than that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A lot of motherfuckers just died on the top of that tower. You felt that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do we do? Is that the end of the ritual?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How much time left on that hour, buddy?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Enough to get back to our friends, probably.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've got to go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we attack now? Just the two of us?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, we should not do that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We could.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Between you and me, we're the most powerful ones in the group.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I just don't feel like freeballing it right now, and I'd really like the group.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know, but will you at least confirm that yes, we are the most powerful?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Clearly. We are the most, as the kids say, OP. Let's get back to the group.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Hold me tight. Mr. Mistoffeles, back down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It goes into a rapid dive, making its way back towards where you left the rest of your party. The rest of you, you can go ahead and regain your short rest. You get your Wild Shape back. You can spend any hit dice to heal up if you'd like. If you haven't already.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I already did it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, good. I also need all of you to roll a wisdom saving throw, please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Everybody?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everybody who was on a short rest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If we had had a Feast, we'd have advantage on this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We would.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Just to make sure: I used Gnome Cunning, because I get advantage on wisdom.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not a "magical" effect.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. So then I'll take my first roll, which was two. And then I will add my wisdom saving throw number, which is ten, so I have 12.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I want you to explain every roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In the rest you take, the Shadowfell does not seem to have any adverse effect on your presence.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: However...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's no "however." You complete your rest fine. You guys all gather your stuff, you take a breath and prepare for the next leg of your venture as the door to your building slams open, Scanlan and Vax arriving, just leaping off the back of the gloom stalker that they had under their control. Who is also about to lose its...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How much longer do they have?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fly away!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Attack the tower. Tell it to attack the tower.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Really? It's going to forget halfway there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe we can mess one person up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fly away! Just fly away!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: On the rest, could I have worked a little bit more on enchanting the silver bullets?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It'll take a few days of getting that to happen.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I just keep working on it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did we feel that (whoosh) within the building?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You didn't. You may have heard something strange, but it didn't really catch your attention. You guys spent your time resting on the inside of the building.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What'd you see?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Saw a lot of fucking people just die on the top of that tower. I can't guarantee it, but I think it's a safe bet that your girl Delilah is up there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's where I figured she'd be.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It seems they've completed at least some part of the ritual.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, there was some sort of massive pulse of energy, 20-something hooded figures just dropped dead on the spot. A wave of some shit blasted through us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I run out and look at the tower and see if the orb looks different?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I join Vex.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys rush out and peek outside of the doorway towards the top of Entropis. You see that the glowing pulse is gone. The energy tethers from the siphons are gone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I look around. Are we still in the Shadowfell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perception check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's not great. 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sounds of relief)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Motherfucking Mercer. That intonation.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If you rolled low enough, he'd be like, "You don't know." Seattle! You've taken us to Seattle!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, we should fucking get up there, then, huh?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we go straight up the tower?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What else are we doing here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, all right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's head to the base.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But we're going to fight an aerial battle against super-magical things.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're weighing risk here. What do we think would happen if we spent an hour having that Feast right now?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Actually, that's true. Nothing's going to change at this point.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: burning the city. Oh god, Vex is rubbing off on me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you see Delilah up there?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No. There was a ringleader, but we were too far out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And the ringleader was still standing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How many people were still standing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That would have been three that you noticed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Lots of them died in the blast?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, so it's not even going to be a tough fight. We'll just take down three people and be done, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So easy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The less people we're fighting, the worse it is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Agreed.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It won't just be three.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It might be four.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It'll be... less than three?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Even one with that fucking wall she had last time, we're fucked.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How far did the blast go that you saw?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We were 100 yards out or something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you were probably about 300 feet out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We didn't do any research on that wall, did we? That spell? Did anybody do any research on that spell that we saw her do? Down in the ziggurat?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We kind of figured out what it was. It was a modified version of a spell we've seen before.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've seen Prismatic Spray. It's a prismatic spell in nature but you didn't really research any means of defeating it or bypassing it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you still have that Earthquake spell?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I believe me and Pike both do, yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We couldn't, like, earthquake the tower to the ground. Could we?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Between me, you, and Pike? We can take this tower down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that true?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I just don't know about us going to the top, if we could maybe bring it--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, if we could maybe bring the top down here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a good idea, if you can really do it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I just don't know how big around it is. It might be fucking huge.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How big around is the tower?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the very base--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's looking at the tower.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- it's about 170, 180 feet in diameter.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pike and I check our spellbooks real quick.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I do a little engineering? If I were going to punch at it...

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also, the idea that we're going to sneak into that tower is farfetched.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, we either have to fly up to the top or bring it down to us, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like the idea of bringing it down.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Even if it fails, the fight will still come to-- Either we bring the fight to them, or we rip down the tower and bring the fight to us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: For up to a minute and a hundred foot radius, centered at a point...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It deals 50 bludgeoning damage to any structure in contact with the ground in the area when you cast the spell. If it drops to zero hit points, it collapses and potentially damages nearby creatures. So the question is, do you think that'll be enough to drop a solid obsidian tower?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a tough call. Twice in a row?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But, I mean, two Earthquake spells and Grog.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have a siege arrow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I will point out this will be burning mine and Pike's 8th-level spell, but it might be worth it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It feels like it's a 3.2 earthquake, we need a 6.2 earthquake.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's true, we do. Let's be honest. We really do need a massive shake.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if we weaken the outside and then hit with the earthquake?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can tunnel out underneath it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think whatever was going on up there is gone. I think it's happened.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, Delilah's still up there, so if she falls at least she takes some damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fair.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm just going to throw my vote in the ring here, that I think we should take the time for the Feast. You know, we're not killing piles of rats in the sewers, here. This is serious.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: When last time we fought Delilah, were any of us scared of her?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's not what I'm afraid of.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wisdom saving throws are major. She could take control of us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm not against that, but I think one person should stay out of the Feast and keep an eye in case they leave in the hour that we're feasting.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, if someone's going to stay out of the Feast, it should be the guy who already has advantage on everything.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, that too, yeah. I just can't get afraid, that's all I was going to say.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but you can be taken control of with your brain, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's assuming a lot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Damn it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or we just go get it. We just go after it and go get it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm against the Feast. I think we should just run in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just don't feel like there's time, honestly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Also, I'm vegan, I don't know if I could eat everything at the feast.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It is largely GoFiBePo?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: GoFiBePo? Why didn't you just name it a Poobah Platter?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that would have been way easier.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How far are we from the tower in this little house?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In this house, you're a little over a half mile away from it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a ten-minute walk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So this house is just outside of the perimeter wall of the inner cloister.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You guys could do the Feast and some of us can help tunnel out the ground during that hour.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know. I don't think we're going to bring it down.

lines.name: GROG
lines.text: I don't know if we're going to bring it down. It was a cool idea, but I don't know if we're going to do it. We're no white ancient dragon.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What's it made of? Obsidian?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You haven't been close enough to really tell, but it looks to be made of a very thick, dark obsidian or onyx-like material.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's also unsettling as fuck, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, it's probably magically protected.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Probably.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It may just hover there if we knock this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is very true.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It may be keeping the ground up as opposed to being sitting on the ground at that point.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So we're going to try to fly up?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or walk up through the inside.

lines.name: GROG
lines.text: Raise your hand if you want a Heroes' Feast.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: For you all, yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Four?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that a raise or not?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you scratching your ear or are you raising your hand?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, damn it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, so, are we four?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm just nervous. I know we don't have time, but what if this is one of those decisions where later we're like "We should have fucking done a Heroes' Feast"?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, let's do it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't know, though, I don't know if we have the time. This is hard.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, the transaction upstairs has already happened, whether they get away or not.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have a feeling we're going to be down here a while.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe we can prepare the Feast, keep an eye out. If we have to ditch out on the Feast early, then we do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keyleth looks out the window again. Are people panicked, are people running around? Is there a rabble in the street?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's no technical window in this building. There's the door.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She just pushes her head against the wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do notice, there's no panic, but you do see a number of-- and this is interesting-- you glance out, and you don't see any undead wandering the streets of the inner cloister. At least, not like the outer area was. You do see-- make a perception check, actually.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, that's good! 30!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see, throughout the street, which, the street from here gets about halfway to the tower before it hits a building and curves around. You see maybe 35 or 40 total people in matching or close cultist robes or similar colors, all making their way towards the tower.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're dressed for an occasion. Fuck it. Just go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We got to go. 35 to 40 people? Let's kill 'em all on the way up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Man, you're frosty today. You're just--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're trying to come over into our territory. I don't like it. They're all assholes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shall we go in?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, how are we going to go in, though? Just flying up?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We got a carpet, and we got wings.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We gotta go, y'all.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Beeline to the tower.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then what? And then what, though? Once we get there? Play it by ear?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Throw everything off the top. Break everything. Smash everything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's Delilah. She's going to destroy us. Do we have any way to neutralize her magic?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, you could turn into a... no.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can't. I gave Vax Foresight. I cannot turn into a beholder today.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you have Shapechange?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (gasping)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, this is almost a plan. Let's do this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's more than we normally have.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's far more.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are there a lot of gloom stalkers around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can tell with the loss of magical energy that they've been tossed askew a bit. Their patterns of circling and being intent, they're a little more scattered a bit, but there are still maybe a few dozen that look over the inner cloister.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's make our way to the tower and maybe head up through the tower. We don't have to necessarily fly up to the top.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait a minute. Did the orb at the top turn the same way that the orbs in the ziggurat turn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There were faint orbs that were taking the energy and focusing it towards that center altar, and when everything faded after the shock wave, what you saw looked like the tiniest star. It was just a speck of extremely bright light that to look directly at it hurt.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know! I don't! Just go get it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm honestly still kind of into the earthquake idea. Bringing down the tower. I'm not going to lie.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's not going to work!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How do you know?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You said 50 points of damage?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can take 50 points of damage. I can take two earthquakes, personally.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, just from a metagaming scenario, that's not even-- that can't even hurt--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, no, no. The tremor deals 50 bludgeoning damage to any structure in contact with the ground in your area when you cast the spell, and at the start of each of your turns until the spell ends, and the spell lasts a minute.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So you get ten 50s.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ten of those. Ten 50s.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, and then times two.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: With Pike and I.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So that's 1000 points. Over a minute. That's better than I thought.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it concentration?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's concentration for up to a minute, and it has a 500-foot range, and a 100-foot radius. So Pike and I could split, half and half of the tower.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's pretty fucking Hollywood. I kind of like it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right! All right, let's do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I feel like if we go right up to the top of the tower, it's like walking into the danger.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's bring the tower down to us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is insane!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And you can still fuck shit up while you got that earthquake going, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, how do you mean?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, yeah, if you have that spell going, you can do other things in case things attack us?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you just doing Earthquake the whole time, or are you just standing there staring at the ground?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's my concentration, so I can keep it going and do an instant reaction spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do other things, you can't do another concentration spell.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're focusing on the tower.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, I can throw a Fireball and keep it going, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's really big. All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I say the movers and shakers get the cloaks. Let's head out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Get up as close as we can to support Pike and Keyleth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And we keep them safe. We are playing defense.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: God, I hope this works.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: God, I hope this works, too.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know if this is going to work!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is stupid as fuck!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're distance. Anybody gets near them, we take them out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Grog, can you at the right moment just do a big-- see if you can topple it over?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can try and do whatever you want. I can run around and punch a bunch of holes in it, whatever.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to focus everything on one side of the tower, we're going to try and bring it down in a direction. Here we go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Both on the same side.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: LAURA Just trying to gauge Matt.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know! Matt's stone cold!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's imagining a whole other set of faces here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, let's teleport inside that dragon. Come on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, what's the plan, guys?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's the plan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're going to get close enough so that they can do their 500 feet distance. But keep a distance to the tower.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And if we can be hidden while we're doing this, instead of being open. We have a 500-foot range here. We've got a dope-ass range.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Keyleth's got a cloak. Pike's got a cloak.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm huge.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's huge.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're going to try to get in a building that's closer to the tower.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Seeming lasts for eight hours, so you're still under the guise of that illusion.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Although we don't--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: -- need that anymore.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, we can look like cultists.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Keyleth, you said that there's no other undead around here, right? Maybe we shouldn't look like undead, then.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can you shift what we look like without changing it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a one-time thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe just drop it and we'll be cultists.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How many robes did we swipe?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We've got the one from the guy whose head we just crushed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You would have four cloaks, because there's two you got from the outside at the ritual, and there's the one from the guy you killed when you got here. Well, technically, there was the two that you killed when you got there, but you didn't say you grabbed those. Oh, you did, you grabbed them off. So that's two, five, six. You have six cloaks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, and then the one, the guy that we just killed in front of the --

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was included.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Me and Pike, she could be on my shoulders and we could share one cloak.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! That's good!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have that Cloak of Smashing that Percy gave me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Totally 'Little Rascals' it! Oh, I love it!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we'll just robe it up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys all throw on the--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I almost feel like it should be the other way around.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To make it look like our arms can reach the ends of the cloak-- are they sleeved cloaks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, they are.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughing)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Mythcarver! You used Mythcarver to pull a Little Rascals!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There will be no survivors!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "The dread Pirate Roberts is here for your souls!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey guys, it's the third time Scanlan has used Mythcarver! (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a vestige right there!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's gone from exalted to shamed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It retracts into a dagger now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Never happens. This never happens.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. In a hip montage, you pull out the various cloaks, assemble your materials, getting ready.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We are a bunch of assholes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan hops on top of Pike, the cloak is placed over you. You get your sleeves ready, and you all walk out into the cold air of the Shadowfell, making your way towards the center of the city.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Be cool. Be cool.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm also going to say, some time in the last several hours, I don't remember what the armor is set to, to necrotic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I assumed that was the case.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think that was already there, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Always be winking. Left eye.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does everybody have their arms, that we've run into so far? Or are they missing an arm, too? An eye and an arm or just an eye?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It varies. Not everyone seems to be missing a hand, but most of them are missing an eye.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You all look like my sister.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Your depth perception may be off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, we go!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You make your way through some of the side roads, following around, and you can see now that the closer you get to the city, the more the structures, the buildings here, are built in a spiral. The roads don't intersect at spokes, they all gradually curve in to the tower. If you're looking at it overhead, it looks like this large spiral into the tower, like a pinwheel. You follow the curvature of the road, which prevents you from seeing the end point, and as you begin to get close to some of the clusters of people that are walking with a brisk walk, but still walking towards the tower, you fall back a little bit to not draw any attention. As you're making your way there, you watch as two individuals hurry up that were a little bit behind you, and rush up to the side and are walking in pace. They glance over.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hoods forward.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of them, who appears to be a younger man, probably 18, 19 or so, who's got this little patch of reddish brown chin fuzz and looks a little malnourished. He still has both eyes. He rushes up real fast, his hood pulling back a little bit, and he's looking around, excited but also with trepidation. "So it's happening, huh? It's really happening!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess so.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's fucking wild.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So exciting.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm so excited to be here!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, don't.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Keep your mouth shut! Just keep your mouth shut!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just nod and smile.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks at you and goes, "Oh! I didn't know the Whispered One takes the special ones, too!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep! Sure does!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What are you going to do after?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Surely you've thought.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm pretty low on the totem pole here. I'm just excited to be on the right side of history."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ditto.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fuck the normies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right." And he rushes up past you guys to try and catch up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So awkward.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think he bought it. I think we played it really cool there, guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm really bad at holding my eye shut for this long.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So are we close enough now that we can start this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not yet. You're about maybe 1,000 feet or so away.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to see if there's any structures that are within distance so that once they set up and start, I can get to them. Maybe we can perch.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We only need to be so far out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can cover you from a roof.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perception check, Percival.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also wondering how we're doing in the gloom stalker department?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No one's seen you, currently. It seems that whatever piercing vision they have, it does not seem to pierce robes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to keep an eye out for buildings, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Then you as well make a perception check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do check a few that are third-story, and a lot of them are almost in steeple-like spires at the top. You start to notice there is a theme. A lot of the buildings closer to the tower are built in a similar theme as the tower itself. You begin to see the edges of the roofs curve up into their own spikes, and the further in you go, the more dangerous and unwelcoming the deeper inner cloister of Thar Amphala is to witness. You can see now certain people are climbing onto the roofs. They're getting up there, almost like they're preparing for some sort of a festival or a fireworks show.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like the Fourth of fucking July.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The aliens are coming and we're welcoming them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, they're not wrong.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You notice, Vex... There's been no change in daylight or nightlight here. It's been this constant deep, dark gray gloom that hangs over the Shadowfell, unchanging, unshifting. There's a creeping brightness on the horizon that you feel rising.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're getting ready to teleport.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you watch as that creeping brightness forms a dome over your space, and then comes to a close over the top of the tower, and where once there was this gloomy skyscape, you now see what appears to be a brighter, clouded sky. The temperature grows a little colder, and you begin to see snowfall. Gentle snow begins to fall, and you watch as some of the cultists surrounding start reaching up and catching it in their hands.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Now, now!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We've still got to attack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's totally taken us to Whitestone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's okay, we can still kill everybody.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a nature check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're in the north. There's a lot of places that snow. It could be Draconia. There's a lot of places that snow.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But it's Delilah Briarwood.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have no direct idea of where you are, but based on the weather that you left Whitestone in not too long ago, this isn't Whitestone or near Whitestone. The weather patterns are a little more classic snow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it winter in Wildemount right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's the tail end of winter in a few places.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tower still needs to come down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go. Let's move. Let's attack. Are we within 500 feet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are about now within 500 feet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fucking get into the building that we can, and then start it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pike and I huddle together and try and join forces.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Let's do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I would ask you to listen before you make a fool of "yourselves. I've watched you since you stepped into my domain, and I'm not going to lie, it's "been entertaining. I admire your gumption. It reminds me of others who have tried what you are "trying. But they're dead now, so I leave the choice to you. You can either walk away, or you "can join me, or you will die, and join me anyway."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Eff that shit. Just do it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No one walks away.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: People don't tell us to stop if they're not afraid of what we're doing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: To the end.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: To the end.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To the end.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, let's just pretend that's not really happening.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I love you all. We do it, above the screaming, howling Horror Nights sound effects.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I pull Silence.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As you guys clasp hands, and begin the intricate incantation for the Earthquake spell, you can hear the cheers of people on the rooftops. They're standing up now, and they're all shouting, "Yes! Yes, I hear you!" You get the sense that perhaps you weren't the only ones that have been spoken to, although the conversations may differ from individual to individual. As you guys complete your incantation, you watch as the dust begins to rise around the base. You see Entropis begin to quiver back and forth, and you watch as everyone begins to rush to the edge of the rooftops, then rush into the streets to look up, their hands raised to the sky, not sure what this means, but basking in whatever glory this next sign or omen is to be. You watch as a loud, shattering crack sound hits, and you watch as one large, snaking, carving line begins to work its way up one side of the tower. Up another. And the collective gasp of hundreds of voices across the city seem to echo, (gasps). You watch as one side buckles, and the tower begins to slowly (rumble) to the ground.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it falling towards us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's falling not towards you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We thought of that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But not the entire tower.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all, taking in what's happening, watch as that one apex of the spire slowly makes its way down to the surface of wherever you are on top of the rubble that once stood as Entropis.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It kind of worked.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, it wasn't bad.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It brought it down. Did anyone of significance die in the process?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can only assume.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we see who it is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're too far away. You're 500 feet away from this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Broom.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're going up to it or waiting till it comes down all the way?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I mean, it's landing, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's landed. It settled itself. It's kind of cocked to one side. For it to land in the rubble, it's not a perfect platform, it (rumble) and comes to rest at a very faint angle among the ruined, broken, jagged obsidian pile. It's a thousand million flecked arrowheads all jumbled in this broken glass-like landscape of destroyed tower, and there, the very zenith of this once-grand structure sits resting, waiting.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's do this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we have an escape plan?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Kill everything.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can Plane Shift us if things get really bad, but I kind of think we're already on our plane.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This sounds like we're all going to die!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure does.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We're going to do this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Start walking.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The minute I grab onto your broom, you can't hear anything, so I'm just going to ride it down to the ground and then let go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I'm done playing, so I'm going to take the Titan Stone Knuckles and smash them together and cast Enlarge on myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your cloak tears around your body, Incredible Hulk style as your form ruins what remains of the black, sheared fabric that once, even by the stretch of the imagination, pseudo-hid you, now...

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A bib remains.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Exactly. It's almost like one of those Chippendale neckpieces. What you see is a number of cultists that were running away from the tower stop and see this, and then, almost instinctually, go to defend. Make an intimidation check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should've raged. That's not terrible. 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And go scattering in other directions. You see some are rushing towards the tower to see what happened, to see if anyone's okay. There are a lot of cultists that were crushed, you imagine, on that side of the city, especially since they were clustering at the base for whatever this was. But many more are still out in the streets as you guys walk (footsteps), making your way towards the central tower.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I take off the robes. Get ready. Slow motion walk towards the tower.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you wish to proceed?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're not sneaking up on shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, no. They know we're here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Circle? Flank? All together? Which one?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll take the carpet if it's available.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Surround the tower, climb up each side?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to grab the carpet. Anybody who wants a lift up, feel free.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I will take that ride.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll broom it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll hop up on the carpet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Carpet's full.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I am genuinely impressed. I'm excited. And I would like for you to remain to "watch my ascension, but far be it for me to rob anyone of a fine death, so come. Come, and be the "next sacrifice for the new age."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're a dipshit!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Eloquence personified.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, via broom...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have to fly to get up to it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's 35 feet up, so.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To the top of the tower?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Platform, whatever you want to call it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to shoot up and past by quite a bit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I hop on a carpet or broom?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can hop on my broom.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was about to say, carpet's a bit full.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll hop on the broom with Vex.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I need a ride as well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Once I'm up, I'm going to scatter.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you want me to be a beholder? Or a dragon?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Beholder has the anti-magic cone eye situation. Just wait and see.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait and see? Figured I should do it now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How long can you maintain a beholder?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How long does it last to cast?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's instantaneous.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, then wait until the moment that it's necessary.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But he could Counterspell it unless I do it now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know if he's actually here yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Help me put this down right... There.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's awesome.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like whenever we come across a map, I feel like we walked into his hand, exactly where he wanted us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's also talk about the fact that it's been years since we've been this close to a map.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is also true.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That is true.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Please. Indulge me where you're coming in from. And these resemble the three curved spires.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Those ideally go like that above it, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, they curve upward and stop about there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So they're not platform-y.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. They come to a point.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take some cover behind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, where are you going?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll go right there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Me and Keyleth-- do you want to land over here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's fine. Yeah, I follow your lead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As soon as I land, I bamf Trinket out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to say that I'm about 80 feet in the air, just off-center. Towards Vex and Keyleth, but just off-center.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keep a distance, don't be in a line with us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to say I'm there, straight up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you are, Vax, right there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The minis look so cool!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I haven't seen them in so long.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know, we've been so far away!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Who's left? Pike?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike and Scanlan. Because you took the carpet, you're going to have to be near Grog for where you guys land. Going to be the circumstance there. Percy, you just run up the side to get there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I was on the carpet and hopped and left them because they had to go pick up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If that's the case, then I'll say that you're landing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, they had to go get Scanlan--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, you had to go get Scanlan?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's 35 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you guys had leave Scanlan behind, that's a whole different thing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I think I'm going to just go ahead and be a beholder and fly in there myself.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, that'll work.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow! Okay! All right! YOLO, why the fuck not?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If you'd be so kind, throw me here, then.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Someday, we could have a game with two beholders on our side.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's true! But not today.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I like that you found a goofy-looking beholder. (goofy voice) Hi!

lines.name: ASHLEY, MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, you guys!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys arrive, the floor is just surrounded in bodies. Cultists of very ornate robes. Mostly you've seen peon-based: black splatters of sackcloth, what was available.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They've been

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You also see, on this side, what appears to be-- sorry, on this side would be Delilah Briarwood.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Bitchface Briarwood.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bitchface Briarwood!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On this side, you see what appears to be a black, armored, massive, not quite goliath-sized, but a thick, dark black knight of jagged dark metal armor, what appears to be a longsword that emanates this dark energy, and floating above--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, balls.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, what's flying?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Put it away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I don't need it!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Those are my platforms, I can take them back anytime I want!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no! What is that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see a field of crackling energy just bursting around the outskirts of his form. You see one hand is out, in a welcoming position, while the empty wrist that once contained a hand is now open on the other side. You see the bald, hairless head, which is covered in spots and tugged open, bits of flesh that have curled away from rotten decay. You see the cheeks sunken in where the skeletal teeth are now emblazoned in a terrible grin. You see the right eye, and the gaping hole where a bright green, bursting, flaming vacuous void where an eye once was now drifts off a trail behind it. You see there, reborn before you, the Whispered One, the Undying King. Vecna himself.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh god, we're in it!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't like it being this close.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll probably all die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (screaming)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Matthew Mercer, may I borrow your Monster Manual so I know what I am?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Marisha actually has a page for it, if you want that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do have a page. Do you want my beholder page?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's terrible.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's terrible for me, too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: My teeth hurt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: My teeth hurt?!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's terrible. I'm not okay with that roll.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, give me that back page. Sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Back page.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It doesn't say what his initiative is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You have to roll. It's a dex modifier plus a d20 if you don't have initiative?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Your initiative is normal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your initiative is whatever the creature's initiative is, which is its dex modifier.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Plus a d20.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: When was the last time we went to bed?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, it's a normal amount of time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I mean, like, right before coming? I can't remember the last time we had a full rest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A full rest would have been maybe four or five hours ago.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. I think I have all my Lucks. That's why I'm asking.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think you've burned since we've come through.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not 100% sure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I also gave you advantage on everything.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know it! Girl!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think you didn't use anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Initiative order. 25 to 20?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 20. Shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fuck, guys. Guys.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Me?! Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have no plan!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We're fully Leeroy Jenkins-ing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fully. Leeroy Jenkins!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, what's your dex?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My dexterity? 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Technically, you rolled the same initiative as the death knight, so he'll go right after you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. The death knight, by the way, is what Colonel Arnold Fuck is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, nice!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You had 18, 17.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 16. Sylas, broomstick-up-his-ass, death knight Briarwood.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This first round is definitely a surprise attack on them, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh yeah! Totally!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They did not see this shit coming. At all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. So.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I had so much hope when we took down their tower. It went away very quickly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It did, but I think that probably made a lot of cultists go away.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Guys, we've got to start the new campaign sometime.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Beginning of the round.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We all die.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I cast Game Over. 20th-level spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fuck you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're going to die. Yep!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Obviously, we're not at the top of the round.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so. Vecna, as he stands there, seeing the beholder arrive over the edge, seeing the paladin in the sky, seeing the rest of these individuals cluster in, goes, "Very well. I wanted to talk more. Please, sit." I need Scanlan, Vax, Grog, Keyleth, and Vex to all make wisdom saving throws, please.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ugh, should have done that fucking Feast!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We knew we were going to say it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shit, I'm gonna lose my fucking 9th-level spell.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Not necessarily!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh fuck, yeah. A natural 19.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have a feeling I have to roll really high against fucking Vecna!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you have a Luck?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yeah, Tary had Luck, not Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Neither have Luck. I'm a beholder.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, you have all of your other stuff.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you sure about that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it like Shapechange?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is True Polymorph. I am this creature.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, it's True Polymorph.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He is that creature.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's hot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Except it's not, because I'm about to not be anymore.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because he's going to cancel it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: God damn it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, Jesus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You resist.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god, you have to roll so high in order to resist.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Even with advantage? Oh, fuck.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They roll disadvantage against you, too.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, you didn't say me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You skipped me. And I rolled a 20.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You rolled a 20?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You fall straight down 80 feet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (nervous laughter) Oh, fuck! Oh man!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: None of us can do anything to help him?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We slow-motion walked into our own death.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, shit!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is Pike out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you are-- Oh god!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Walls brought down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Prone, there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fucking shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rest of you are also held.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is this charmed or frightened?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, it's not.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What does being held mean?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's paralysis.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Until we save, or until his concentration is broken, I assume.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And rage would have no effect on this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fucking shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And he's going to go ahead and shift up about 20 more feet and kind of glance over the battlefield a bit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's a god! He's a golden god!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He actually is one. And he won't jump off a 1000-foot cliff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chuckles) Apparently. All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: T minus ten minutes until he turns into a goldfish.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can only be so hopeful.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's plenty of time for us to die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends his turn. Delilah's now going to go.

lines.name: TRAVIS, LAURA
lines.text: Oh, good!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow, what a way to lead off the round!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My anti-magic cone is not in effect, I assume?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, isn't it just naturally wherever they're looking?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's wherever you're facing, but he hasn't had a turn to go yet, he basically just arrived.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it would be kind of in this path here, wherever you would have come in in this regard. So it would be this direction.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a big fuckin' headlamp.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughs) Just frozen there. I really want to swallow and I can't close--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was under the impression that the eyeball was passive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm checking right now, actually.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, you have to choose. At the start of each turn--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the start of its turn, which way the cone faces and whether the cone is active.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I haven't had a turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And if it's active?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're holding your action for being able to move.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anyway.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, so... (laughs)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We got this, guys. How many of us are still able to move?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Three of you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey! Okay!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Looking up! Things are looking up. He has 12 hit points, by the way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Being held. What's the deal with that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're paralyzed. Which means you are incapacitated, you automatically fail strength and dexterity saving throws, attack rolls against you have advantage, and any creature that hits you within five feet, it's a critical hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Basically worst scenario possible. That's all you had to say: worst scenario possible.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It could be worse, but it would take math. This is bad.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pike's going to solve everything.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, she can get us out of this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Flipping those pages.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Remember this look, boys and girls. On Matt's face. As the chef carefully picks the menu of our-- Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of our destruction? Of our doom?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He has been grooming us and fattening us up for two years.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Delilah is going to move.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And is going to step over Vax's body on the ground.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, bitch! You better back off, bitch!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hope you're wearing underwear, bitch, because he just looked up your skirt!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And looks at you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (small voice) Me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (yelling)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No! Why would you do this?! How you do dis Matt?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, so make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're held, but you still make a constitution roll.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on...

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Matt, how do you do this?!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Natural 20! (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No way!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I said, biiiiitch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you take half as much damage, which is good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I'm really glad we healed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vax on the ground just starts going (unintelligible yells).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so instead of 61 points of necrotic damage, you take 30 points of necrotic damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm shaking, guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Leroy!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Got to squeeze my spiky dice to wake up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ow, ow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You okay?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whimpering) I'm good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Blood pressure's a thing right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll end her turn. Grog.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Holy shit, Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your turn happens at the same time the lair action happens.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And the Death Knight, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And the Death Knight. He's going to go directly after you. You guys going on the same turn, I gave you a little bit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh man, I am not-- This does not feel good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, shit! Oh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as the bodies on the ground quiver (sound of bones cracking) And begin to rise up around you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, forget them! Fix us! Forget them, they're nothing. Fix us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They could just attack us until we die.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fix. Us. They're tiny.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have a plan. I have a plan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fix us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What, you're going to pledge your fealty to the fucking--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Some sort of-- I don't know, can you restore... Restoration?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have mass Restoration?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's not a spell, you guys!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm useless!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know if Pike can fix this!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think she can fix it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Mass Restoration.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mass Anti-hold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of them's going to strike at the beholder that's up in the air; that's going to be a 15, what's your armor class?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a 19.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: To do what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To attack you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, so I'm at disadvantage, but I have advantage, so it would be one straight roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it has advantage against you because you're paralyzed, so yeah, it would be one straight roll. The first roll was 19.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, so no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. Your armor class is 21 naturally?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It is 21 when the daggers are out, and my daggers are in my hands. I mean, I don't know, this is kinda loosey-goosey. All right, then I'm at 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so it still misses you. The other one, no, misses. Both of them just miss you. The effect of the 9th-level spell is just enough of a vibration that the attacks are being-- You're moving just, (grunts) ever so faintly out of the way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Familiar.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One attacking Keyleth. That is a 24.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you suffer eight points of slashing damage. And then Vex, that is a 12 to hit? And a 20 to hit. Neither hit? So as they're striking you, they're hitting the armor, it's just not cutting through. They can't seem to get through it. So that worked out okay in your favor.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thanks, dragon armor!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog? You're paralyzed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Uh-huh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I believe you make another saving throw at the end of your turn to try and shrug off the effect.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I go into a paralyzed rage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope. But make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: God, we've got to roll like a 27 in order to break it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope. You're still locked in place, unable to move.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will never be able to break it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A 20 didn't break it, so yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, there's no way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A natural 20 would break it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A natural 20.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A natural 20 would break it, that's the only thing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have a modifier of zero, so.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Gotta fucking attack that bitch.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Holy shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, you know what? No. He's gonna stay back there and move this way to get out of the way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fuck you, Sylas.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the Death Knight kinda steps over to the side, you watch as this small sphere of darkness begins to (crackling sound) into his hand, and then throws it with an arc, in a 20-foot radius centered on a point that it chooses.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's rough stuff.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're a beholder, do you get legendary actions and resistances and shit?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't think-- I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's legendary resistances, not actions.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's a legendary resistance?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get to reroll-- Unless it doesn't have it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This doesn't.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, the beholder does not. It's not that powerful. All right, I need Pike, Grog--it's a dexterity saving throw. So Grog and Scanlan automatically fail. Percival and Pike, I need you both to make dexterity saving throws, please.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Oh, fuck.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. 20.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (brightly) Six!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait! Oh, I thought that was ten.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have advantage also, against--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. You take a total of 35 points of fire and necrotic damage. You take 35 points of necrotic damage, and because you're resistant to fire, you only take 17 points of fire damage. 35 points.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Did you say 17, Matt?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan? And Grog. You both take-- Actually no, since you have resistance to fire-- Which actually, your form is, I should give you the large form.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I added wrong. Wait, wait! Stop everything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes? What're you stoppin'?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I added wrong. My saving throw was a 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Was a 23?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: On being held?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On being held? Still fails.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you did a 24, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I rolled like a 27.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She rolled a 27.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 27, yeah. We gotta go!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's nowhere-- We're gonna die.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So what did I just get hit with? 70 points or something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You took 70 points of fire and necrotic damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Awesome.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you have resistance to any of that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not as a beholder, no. Okay, that ends the Death Knight's turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, he's just dunking on us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, they're top-loading. They're top-loading.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vex. Go ahead and make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Crotch in face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's cocked, roll again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope, still locked in place.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, for the wisdom save?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. All right, I'm going to touch Grog and cast Lesser Restoration.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, which cures...?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Paralysis.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then, yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. So I've just got to run around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, you are cured of paralysis.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do that a lot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You feel your form freed of the effect of the spell. Do you want to move?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How many undead are there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are one, two, three, four, five over there.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You already used your action to cast a spell, so.

lines.name: ASHLEY
