lines.text: Yeah. So, as my bonus action, I'm going to cast Shield of Faith on Percy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Which will just add two to your AC.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, thank you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What level is Shield of Faith?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: First level.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, yeah. So there you go. Just mark that for yourself.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, it's on!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Do you want to move, or are you going to stay where you are, Pike?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You've got a Death Knight, if you're feeling frisky.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you want to move or stay where you are?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Sorry. I'm going to hide behind the beholder.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you move around Grog and get right about there. That ends your turn, Pike. Vax, make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to attempt to roll a natural 20.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You have advantage on everything.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's good. That's okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's not a natural 20, though, which is what it's going to take. I'm going to use Luck.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, you rolled a 19.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 18 and a 19.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Plus anything?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Luck. No. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn, Vax. Percival.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to scoot against the wall towards myself as far as a reasonable amount of movement will take me because I don't like clumping. I'm going to take aim at the asshole in the sky, and let's do a couple of things. I'm going to take Bad News out, and just to keep everything reasonable, I'm going to burn a point for dead-eye, and I'm going to take a sharpshooter shot on him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so minus five to the attack roll.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Minus five to the attack. That's a crit! That's a crit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You rolled a 19, yeah, which you have now at level 18.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: At level 18, that's a crit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is with which gun?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is with Bad News, so that's going to be 2d12. That's going to be 4d12 plus six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is Bad News, you said?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Bad News. I don't know if this also doubles-- I don't think it does-- but I'm pouring all of Cabal's Ruin into this shit, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The actual hit from Bad News does nothing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The non-enchanted attack from Bad News hits and dissipates across his form. It's not half damage. Nothing. This is Vecna. Cabal's Ruin is considered magical damage, so that will go through.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Was that the one you critted on?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I burned a crit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You gained the grit back, though.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: These don't double, do they?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically, they do, because it is a crit. All dice double, yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Get him!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does my other rule also apply to this? Does this add to bleed damage now? Maybe not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't think so, because it's an outside effect.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's an outside factor. That's fine. I'm with you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you know what? It would because just like any other critical effect, yes, it would.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It would.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (counting) 32. That's 32.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you count that one?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 36 points of damage, times two.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 72 points of electrical damage, and then he's also going to get a bleed of 31. No, he's going to get a bleed of 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He will get 15 because he's resistant to lightning, so he takes half of that next time.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But he still has to roll concentration.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, for 36.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll take it, and goodbye, Cabal. I'll gain more when he hits me with some magic shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh boy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's such an anti-climactic fight because none of us can do anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That would be 18 as half that. DC is 18 to maintain concentration. Yeah, he saves.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: God fucking damn it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Barely. By one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: By one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: By one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: On concentration?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where is she?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's over here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What is she doing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She just stepped over Vax's paralyzed body and threw a Finger of Death at Vex.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. Let's burn that little bit of Animus again and burn that grit point again for advantage. Let's hit her with Bad News. Actually, I'll cast... Hex on her, as well, just for fun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, let's give her, just in case she gets grappled-- let's make it constitution disadvantage. Fuck it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And then I've got bonus, and I'm doing sharpshooter again. Thank god I did because that was a terrible shot. That's 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 does not hit, unfortunately. As you go to fire--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do we know what would hit?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We don't.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: War God's Blessing to add ten?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gives a plus ten?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, that would definitely hit, I'd imagine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's way over her AC.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not bad. That's (counting) 20 points of piercing damage and five points of necrotic damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's like (cries out, breathes heavily).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's my roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You glance over with the scope and see as she turns and looks at you. You can see, what you didn't see earlier, is one normal eye she has and one yellowish-green eye with a cat-slit pupil.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What does that even mean?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Vecna's been busy. Okay. This is going to get interesting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that ends your turn, Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's all I can do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan, go ahead and make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't move my eyes or anything or turn on my anti-magic?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As far as the ray that you have, the eye perspective, you're hitting right there, so you're just out of range to get rid of the paralysis from Vex and off Vax. If you manage to break from this somehow and you rotate, the spell would have no effect while it's on them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're broken from it by being in his gaze? Am I in his gaze?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you are not.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So I can still cast spells. But if I move into his gaze, I cannot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. Or if you shoot something through the cone, it will dissipate.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If I shoot up at Vecna, will it go through the cone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, probably. You're just outside of it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I will not go through the cone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, what are you doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It is now my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Also, I need you to make a concentration check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, my spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, transformation.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I get advantage as a gnome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do. How much damage did you take on that one, total, from the blast? From the blast that you took on that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 70 points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have to beat a 35.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. As a wisdom?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Constitution saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Constitution saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In theory, Scanlan, before it came to your turn, you dropped your beholder form.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! I'm no longer paralyzed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The spell maintains itself.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No! But I'm a different guy!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's your mind it affects.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Any spell still carries over the effects on you. You can't wild shape and--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He lost concentration?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He lost concentration on his big spell, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, Scanlan!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll let you remake that saving throw with your constitution. Sorry, your wisdom. With Scanlan's wisdom.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, do I get advantage because of magic?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, because it is magic.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And can I inspire myself?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you can.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. I will inspire myself. 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You shrug off the paralysis at the end of your turn. You're now free to move.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just move. I can't act, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, that's the end of your turn. Keyleth, what are you doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is he 60 feet away from me? Is he within range?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Should I handle Delilah, or should I handle him?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What're you doing? Which one do you want?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can move now, or just in general?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, next turn you'll be able to move.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is he within 60 feet of me? Vecna.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not sure. You'd have to eyeball it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I get directly under his butthole?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can move through Trinket. You'll get two attacks of opportunity from two skeletons.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jesus, balls.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Jesus balls.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'd have to leapfrog over Trinket to get there, but you can do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What about Delilah. Where is she?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Delilah's over here. She and two skeletons right now are lording over the paralyzed Vax on the ground.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If I move at all, I'm going to take opportunity from skeletons.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. They don't do a whole lot of damage, but damage adds up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jesus. Okay, I am going to head to Delilah. I can move up to her, correct?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're going to move straight up to her?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, yeah. Both skeletons get attacks of opportunity on you. That's a nine and a 12. They both hit you, but the mantle writhes out in front of you. You watch as various leaves unfurl almost like a cat's fur on the back of its neck, and it deflects the blows from the skeletons as you rush past.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can give her disadvantage on constitution checks, and whenever she takes damage, she's stunned, or should I do the confusion thing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Either one. They're both good. Go for the first one. Pick one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm turning into Ashley Johnson. Okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to go up to Delilah. (pants) Cotton mouth. Oh boy. Yeah. Okay, I'm going to go up to her and be like, experience what you've been putting all of us through. And I'm going to touch her and I'm going to try and cast Contagion on her with Mind Fire?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mind Fire!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sounds good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hit her with a mind bullet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Mind bullets!

lines.name: TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: That's telekinesis, Kyle!

lines.name: TRAVIS, TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: (singing) How about the power to move you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a melee spell attack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have a bonus to my spell attacks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You've got this!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's cocked. That's even worse. Not great. 18?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 is exactly what you needed. That's her armor class.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (singing) We'll fucking lead as two kings!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughing) Tenacious D for the rest of this fight, please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She now is affected by Mind Fire.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Her mind becomes feverish, and she has disadvantage on intelligence checks and intelligence saving throws, and she becomes confused.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What does that mean? What does confused mean?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: For seven days.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It sounds like she can't cast spells too well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hopefully.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's now considered confused. She's under the effects of the Confusion spell for as long as it lasts.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's me under the effects of being confused about the Confusion spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does that end your turn, Keyleth?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What do you have for a bonus?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't have a lot for a bonus. I can go into an elemental form.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If we attack her, is that going to drop the confusion?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, can we attack her?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, it just lasts for seven days.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It lasts for seven days if she fails the saves. She has three saves in a row, and if she succeeds, it goes away. If she fails, it lasts for seven days.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. She has to make constitution saving throws. But she's under the effects right now, correct? We've been through this before, haven't we?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, yeah. This is one of the ones we tried a long time ago.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It says after failing three of these saving throws, the disease effects last for the duration, so that would make me assume that she has it at least for three rounds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We had this discussion before, because in the ability, it has Slimy Doom, which whenever it takes damage, it becomes stunned, which is the most broken--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I almost did that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know, but I think the DND ruling, technically, they have to fail three saves before it affects them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a lot!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's lame. Three rounds for a 5th-level spell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Look. I'll say this. I'll let Mind Fire work on her for now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, he doesn't look happy. I feel like I just pissed off the DM.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you didn't piss off the DM. This spell has a lot of contention in the community, but the official DND ruling was it doesn't affect until they fail all three rolls, but as it's written, it doesn't say that. It says they're afflicted on being hit, so I'm letting it go through because you didn't choose the cheesy-ass stun-lock broken spell.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It does say that after succeeding on three of these, the creature

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which is what I'm saying. This is between what's written in the spell and the arguments that people have made with DND on Twitter, and they clarified that's not how it works. It's a mis-type. It wasn't clear. I'm letting it work. Be happy with the book.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stop making eye contact. Look down!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How about you just say he did, and don't?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. Let's not and say we did.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He could just evil monologue a little bit, tell us his plan?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's really good at evil monologuing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I really feel like this is the moment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's going to cast a 7th-level Fireball right there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 7th-level Fireball?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's the end of Vax.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We've got to go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need Keyleth, Vax-- you don't auto-save, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Good night.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe the Raven Queen will use you or something.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can't. It's an automatic fail because I'm paralyzed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's actually good. He'll lose the paralysis because he'll be in a coma. We'll just wake you back up and you'll be fine. It's actually kind of good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The skeletons are obliterated.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a natural one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you serious?! Are you serious?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm looking at it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a surprisingly shitty roll. 38 points of fire damage to Vax. 38.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: On a 7th-level Fireball?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know. I rolled really shitty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 38 to you, as well. 38 to Vex. And 38 to Trinket.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a small-- that's a dire armadillo. That's okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 38 to Trinket?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did Delilah take all that damage, too?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Delilah? Yeah, she did. She can't save against his shit. She takes it and (grunts).

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She probably kind of likes it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's like, ooh.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Burn. Sick burn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It made sense for the circumstance. She's up for the sacrifice. All righty, that ends Keyleth's turn. Top of the round. Now it's Vecna's go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I thought that

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was his legendary.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like that you have an enlarged figure Grog. That's cool.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I thought you were complimenting the DM. I was like, yeah, keep it up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like that you made an enlarged figure for Grog.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll kill you last.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is that thing in the middle of the field?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is the altar.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whatever it is, it's really cool.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can we see what's in it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'd have to go check it out, if there was anything.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is he moving towards the altar?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's shifting in the center and looking down for a bit. He goes, "Well, sleep."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can he do that with concentration?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is not a concentration spell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Magic can't put me to sleep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He casts Power Word Kill.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. Well, that's different.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where did Sleep go?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's just what he said.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He meant metaphorical. He meant death.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How many hit points do you have?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm dead. Insta-full death?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Insta-full death.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No saving from it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, what?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Perma-death?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No death saving throws. You watch as the life suddenly fades from Vex's eyes, and she falls to the ground.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vax is watching, frozen.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Matt really doesn't like it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm sorry. It's now Delilah's turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is not going well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe we should leave.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Plane Shift?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She turns and looks at you, Keyleth, and goes--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is this Delilah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is Delilah. "You took him from me. Now I'm going to take him from you." She points down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I thought she was confused.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I have to check what she does now. This may make the change.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, we weren't technically dating when we killed her, so I'm not really sure if she'd know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I get to roll a d10.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's hope he doesn't roll a nine or a ten, y'all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A ten.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You are fucking lying to me! (groans)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's right there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I see it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh shit. Wow, you really went down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm sorry. I'm rolling really well. I'm sorry, guys.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, but that Fireball was super low.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so do I have to roll for an attack on this? Creature has to make a dexterity saving throw. Hold on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know what to do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's 76 points of damage from the Disintegrate spell.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Halved from the Deathwalker's Ward. It's set to necromantic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's force damage. Disintegrate's force damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh. Well, then I'm down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, that means he's disintegrated.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as Vax's form (fluttering noise) turns to dust.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Leaving the armor of the Raven Queen empty on the ground, the daggers (clattering).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No body left?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's no recovering from that, dude.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Bro. We're gone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, it's your turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's happening?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought this campaign was going to last longer than this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I said this was the last episode, and I meant it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You are a terrible person. Oh no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh fuck.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She doesn't have to roll against that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a dexterity saving throw, but he's still paralyzed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He doesn't get advantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You automatically fail dex saving throws when you're paralyzed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can't dex out of something if you can't move.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If I throw you over to her, can you Revivify?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm too far to do anything, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the moment?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It has to be within 60 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From Delilah? She's within 40 feet of you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I retroactively Counterspell? (laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. I'll let you do it. You have your ability back, so I'll let you try for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, with the Disintegrate? Go, Scanlan, go!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you have to roll for this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think I have to roll for this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You roll and add your charisma modifier.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No. Charisma modifier? It's just an 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus two, because you get plus two bonus, so 13.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't add anything else.

lines.name: LAURA, TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: Can you inspire yourself?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not on a reaction, I don't think.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But you're a war bard, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's not a war bard. He's a lore bard.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: War caster.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh man, this does not feel good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Doesn't feel good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It does not feel good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Peerless skill. When you make an ability check. It's an ability check, technically.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's that mean?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That means you can spend another bardic inspiration to it because you're at a 13.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (nervous laughter) It's cocked. It would have been 11. Four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The DC is 16.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh god!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're not disintegrated?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you serious?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Matt is a gentle god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In this flash of vision, Keyleth, you see this happen, and then the bit of inspiration from the Raven Queen that's been trying to push through whatever is keeping her vision at bay here. Your vision flashes back, and then you see Vax on the ground, the extended finger of Delilah as the green energy begins to spiral up from her finger, and Scanlan in the back just says?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. Hey, you know what the problem is with your face? I can see it! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Delilah goes, "What?" and the spell (fluttering noise) dissipates. (sighs)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was a 6th-level spell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does she have any more of those?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We don't know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Because I only have two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That being the case, Delilah is going to go ahead and go. You do get an attack of opportunity on her, Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just straight melee?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Straight melee.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hit her with a stick.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My dice suck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You've rolled shit on that dice every time tonight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's not good. 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13? No, that misses, unfortunately.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Grog, it's your turn now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure. Can I use my-- are we doing this?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I use my action to pick up my buddy Pike, and I'm going to try and throw her as far as I can towards where Vex's body is laying.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you're going to pick her up and move?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's no difference, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's essentially an agreed-upon grapple. You'd be able to move 25 feet with her.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Versus picking her up and throwing her for an athletics check, or something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, but I don't know how far you'll throw her that way. It's up to you. You can stay where you are, if you'd like to.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll make it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You think so?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. I can make it to her.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The initiative is Grog, Pike, Vax right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I should just go unload?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, do your thing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would like to rage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are raging.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I use my full speed to head towards Delilah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting) That's as far as you can get right there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With my bonus action, can I use my Boots of Feral Leaping to leap horizontally 20 feet? I want to get within melee.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make an athletics check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a million. 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (impact) You land right in front of her. She watches you as you (footsteps) run around the side, leap, (impact) right in front of her, this giant, hulking form of muscle.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Reckless, great weapon master.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Turn her to fucking paste.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have two attacks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, two attacks.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why am I light-headed?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Everything's going wrong.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, that, and those drinks were really inappropriate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 28? Yeah, that hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 35, total on the first one. And the second one, 19. Should have taken that other thing. That would have been a crit. Minus five. 27?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 27 does hit, yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Boy, she's got a high AC, doesn't she? 10, 24, 34, three points of necrotic for 37. That's a d8. That's the wrong one. 36 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you rush forward and cleave into her with hit after hit on the axe, you watch as her imposing form is battered around and slashed apart, and as you finish and withdraw the axe from the two strikes, you see her already clutching her stomach. (panting)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: An action surge is a bonus action, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. Just an action surge.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can just do it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should we empty the tank?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll use the action surge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is that three more attacks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two more.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 28 hits, definitely.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 31 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Second attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jesus. Yes, that hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm a monstrous thing. That's a 12, 26, 36, 38, 40, including the enlarged and the necrotic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You slam her with the two extra attacks, knocking her back. As the two additional axe blows slice across the front of her chest, one gets her on the side of her chin. You can see, you've carved the cheek open and broken teeth, and now when she looks back to you, you can see all of her back molars and teeth now, this horrible Joker grin on one side of her face as the blood leaks out. You can see the one gleaming greenish-yellow glowing eye flares open at you. She (spits).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't stop smiling on my account.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn, Grog... All right, so ghostly claws begin to spring up from the ground in a 20-foot radius.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you say claws?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Claws, yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ghostly claws.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there. I need-- Vax fails. I need Keyleth and Grog and Trinket to all make dexterity saving throws. Sorry, strength saving throws.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He can't do anything.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't fuck me, Gil!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Trinket can.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket can't still attack if I'm not alive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll let you. I'll let you, in the purposes of you being dead, Trinket is going to act on his own to defend you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He rolled a seven.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's about to be in a pocket dimension really quick.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, he might go into the pocket dimension.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22. You take five points of necrotic damage, and are not grappled. You take ten points of necrotic damage, reduced to half, five, because of your armor, and you are grappled and paralyzed. Keyleth?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22. You take five points of necrotic damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And Trinket takes how much necrotic damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten, and is grappled. Trinket's speed is zero. All right. Welcome to the God Wars, guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not cool.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why didn't we Heroes' Feast?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It wouldn't have mattered.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't care. One or the other. Get one of those ladies in here!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (heavy footfalls) With these heavy, armored footfalls as it walks, with its fingers forward, it begins carving this sigil in the air. Grabs it and turns it, and as it turns, you watch the same sigil runes appear around Grog and begin to spiral around you. Make a charisma saving throw, please.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck, balls. Hey, y'all, plus one. Don't worry. Four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Banished from this realm of existence.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You appear on the ground in the Shadowfell, in the gaping crater where Thar Amphala once stood. You look around, up to the familiar cloudy, dark sky, and are alone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait. Y'all aren't in the Shadowfell anymore?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, right. Snow's falling.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wildemount, or some shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Without a perception check, is anybody around, or is it just me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nobody's around you, although you do look up and see maybe a dozen or so of the gloom stalkers, swirling up ahead. They haven't noticed you yet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: God fucking damn it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can punch your way out of it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know what? I only have one thought.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh no. He's going to turn to the cards, y'all. He's going to turn to those cards.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We've got this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, perception check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perception check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ugh! Okay. That's good. 14 plus 13, so 27.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do notice, the armored death knight still has a hand out after Grog's banishing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, that's good!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This doesn't appear to be Plane Shift.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So if I kill him, he'll come back? Or if I kill him, Grog won't ever come back? What does that mean?!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll find out. We'll just lay waste to shit until it stops happening. We're going to keep doing terrible shit until terrible shit stops happening.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pickle time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is the worst grin you've ever given us. It's so great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We are at the end of the death knight's turn. Vecna's going to use two legendary actions to cast another spell.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: This feels like when we played in Liam's one-shot when we got on the beach.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was just about to say, this is revenge for Demogorgon!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is very much the beach, isn't it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vecna's going to shift further back on the field to there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is he always going to fucking fly?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Why wouldn't he?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Feet are passe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As he glides over, he looks down and sees the mess that Delilah's currently in. Looks around and sees the options and says, "Well, I hate to see work unfinished."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Again?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Disintegrate?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Disintegrate again.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is the same round, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is the next round.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I try--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He moved out of your range.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now you see as a green ray fires down from the Whispered One above, and within an instant--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, can I bonus action him? Can I use my bonus action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not on your turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got nothing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You turn to dust within the armor. Where once Vax stood, the vision you saw flash you thought might have been a warning, instead it was an omen. You look down and see the raven wings turn to ash, and now there is the empty armor of the Raven Queen, the daggers clattering to the stone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh man. What the fuck?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike, it's your turn.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I can't do what I was going to do. Fuck.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Laura.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Sorry. Hold on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She can't reach you?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can bring you to her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could hold your action and he could bamf you over.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: When are you up?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do whatever you want.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You have to touch her?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you wanted to do something like that, you'd have to begin casting it and hold your action for him to take his turn, and then you could take her there.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, who's up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's you, Percy, then Scanlan.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, so Percy's next, and then it's Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If we don't die in those two turns, yes.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Oh my god, I'm shaking so bad. I will start casting Revivify, and I will hold my turn until Scanlan bamfs us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to be a total dick and not do that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: There's no one in between us?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, we're next to each other.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I mean, no one in between us, like the bad guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, they can go whenever they want.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Delilah already took her turn. Scanlan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, it's my turn. Where's Percy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry. Percy, you're up next.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's still standing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's still standing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. Let's drop a point of grit, and let's get some advantage on this for Animus shot number one. Come on, crit. Not a crit, but still pretty decent. That's a 28 to hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 28 to hit? That will hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's not the full damage. Let's do this, plus let's do that. That's 12 points of piercing damage, five points of psychic damage, and four points of necrotic damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Necrotic damage doesn't do anything, unfortunately.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know. I'll keep that off, then, for now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. She's looking really hurt.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's get that grit back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kill her!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And 24 points of damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that doubled?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, that's doubled. It was terrible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you want to do this on Delilah?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I take it right in her good eye. I want me to be the last thing she sees.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As she turns around, you watch that side of her face explode, and she falls back, the force of it knocking her off her feet. She (impact noise) scatters across the stonework. You glance over, and you can see her looking face-up, and the little green eye in the socket turns and looks towards you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, it's still working?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The eye turned and looked at you from within the socket.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But it's down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's a creature inside of her.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Armor. And I get another grit back because she's dead. Armor. I'm taking-- what's he holding?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's all he's currently holding.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's holding a longsword? Let's get rid of that longsword. I'm going to hit him and make him drop that longsword.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know, this is a lot. I'm taking my third shot with Animus, and this is going to be a sharpshooter shot, and that's not a crit, but that's pretty good. That's 29 to hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's terrible. That's 20 points of damage, two points of psychic damage, and he has to make a strength saving throw or he drops his sword. DC 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He gets a 20 exactly. 15 plus five. But he did take the damage, so he has to make a concentration, which he makes. DC 11, because it's half the damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Concentration? Oh, for that. That's fine. Just because we're at that point where I'm panicking, let's burn an action surge. Boom. Three more shots on the asshole.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you shooting at Vecna?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, Vecna I'm not shooting because he's laughing off my bullets.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Most of the impact deflects off the plate.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're shooting at the death knight? TALIESiN: I'm shooting at the death knight, so now I'm going to do a grit shot. I'm going to burn for dead-eye sharpshooter. That's 27?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 27? Okay, that hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And that's-- oh my fucking god! 20 points of damage, plus one point of psychic damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're fine. You're good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Burning another--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's the last thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got more. I've got three more. I keep killing things. That's 17 to hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17. You watch as he's concentrating on that one spell, and as the one shot hits him, the second one, he puts his arm up and seems to deflect it with his hand.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did he make a constitution save against the last one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, he did.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. This is my last shot. I'm burning another grit, and natural 20. Okay, so that's going to be-- come on. That's better!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I forgot to mention. Vecna took extra damage from your crit earlier.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, he did. He took 15 points of extra damage, halved. 18, 21, 22, 23, 30 points of damage, plus five psychic damage, and he's going to take 15 points of damage, plus three psychic damage next round.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He maintains concentration.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my fucking god!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's hard to break. He was designed for that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to use my bonus action to reload, and that's my fucking turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was a long turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You did good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. End of Percy's turn. Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy, do you want to move on your turn?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's nowhere else.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm letting you know, as it currently stands. Delilah's down.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Delilah's down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And two figures that look pretty much untouched. Scanlan?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What are you trying to say?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm saying, be mindful of your choices.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You know what? I'm going to start making a beeline straight for Keyleth. Fuck it. I'm going to see if I can get some cover behind--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we going to bail? What do we do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm fucking bailing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's up to you. You do have one of them down, and you have two--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you can bail--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But Grog.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can get Grog back. We've just got to get everybody up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You don't even know where I am.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can find him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What about you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm gone. There's no finding me. I'm gone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're picking up armor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I grab Pikey-poo and Dimension Door straight to Vex's beautiful dead body.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like a dead Juliet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will inspire Pike. I don't know if that helps whatever ritual you're about to do, but maybe.

lines.name: TRAVIS, TALIESIN
lines.text: Revivify.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What do you get if you're inspired?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get a d12 that you can spend on something. Which, as you release Revivify, you reach down and grab the cold, lifeless hand of Vex. I need you to roll a wisdom check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With inspiration.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Should she need it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And don't I get gnome cunning, so I have advantage on it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. It's not a saving throw. It's just a check. Roll a d20 and add your wisdom modifier.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We will grab everything we fucking can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18? Yeah. Your breath comes in.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hi.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pike. Are they dead?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You glance up, and you see Vecna still lording over, a big smile on his face. You see the other armored knight walking around, the plated black helmet guarding any expression except for these glowing red dots, the eyes that peer through.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm using any movement I have to pick up the dust of my fallen friend, if there is any dust.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's the dust and his equipment. Those are the two things that are left.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pick up whatever I can.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Scoop him into a little vial.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (vacuuming noises) (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (fake sneeze) Oh no!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is no time for allergies. Fuck!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you get your hands up in the armor and some dust and you gather it in your hand. There's Scanlan. There's you. There's Vex, Pike.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So we're all together?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, Percy's there and Grog is somewhere.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I got as far as I could.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm done. That's all I can do.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So bonus action.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know if you can do a bonus action.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I do a bonus action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You need healing like a mother. Don't shrug at me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's fine.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to cast Healing Word on Vex.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Level two?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Level four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because you've already cast Revivify.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Level two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So 2d4 plus your wisdom modifier, I think.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm already rolling Vax.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're mixing him with your suude?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Ten hit points.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tuck it behind my ear for later.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It doesn't matter anymore.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I haven't seen Vax yet. I haven't seen what happened.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I move?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, because you already took your turn.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that ends your turn? Scanlan, you moved up there and you grabbed the stuff. That's your turn. Keyleth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh god. Okay. Are we trying to get to me so I can get us all out?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, but it's going to take another turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: For Percy to get there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But everyone's coming this way, right? Everyone's coming this way? Then I'm going to-- fucking hell. How does Fire Storm work? I know it's ten ten-foot cubes. Does it have to be on the ground, or can I hit him up there? Can I rain-- "justice rains from above!" Can I do that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I haven't touched that game in so long.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can create a lava fall, essentially.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You'd have to pick one of the two of them to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You pick one, and then you create a bunch of cubes that chain off it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can hit them both.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But I'm not going to be able to hit the death knight and Vecna?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Probably not. Not without hitting Scanlan or yourself in the process.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What if I got out of the way. Could I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We can try it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to do a bonus action and I'm going to go air elemental. Full-on, wrath of my people and my hometown, and I'm going to levitate in a cool tornado-y thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are there any material components for Fire Storm? No, there is not. You can cast that in your form. You levitate up. We'll say right there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's a lot of dead bodies on the ground, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know. This is rough, man. We'll say there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's high, but that's okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How high did you want it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In between, but don't worry about it. I'm going to right onto Vecna and try and swarm it down towards the death knight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How many cubes is it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ten ten-foot cubes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just barely get him. Just barely.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That will do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hold on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do you mean, hold on?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There are some legendary things that I think might be happening.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I get that vibe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not legendary. As you swarm up and begin to formulate the spell, Vecna looks at at you, and you can see with the vacant space where the hand is, there's almost an arcane flash of a hand that goes, (clicks tongue). He's going to attempt to Counterspell you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Roll a one!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What does he have to roll? Under my DC?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He rolled a 14 plus ten, so 24. As you formulate the spell, you watch as the flames sputter out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you come back down to the ground?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I'll try and levitate down a bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You were about there, and with your flying speed, you can land back down on the ground if you want. Sorry. Is that your turn, Keyleth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I guess so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What does it look like when you're looking out at all of us and we're so sad?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It feels awful.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I love it!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're a liar. You're a lying liar.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I've got to play it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's a god floating in the air.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not a god yet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not a god yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That you know of.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He'll be a god in our next damn campaign when we're all dead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's going to reach out with a Flame Bolt.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's because I called him a dipshit when he was talking earlier.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You did blurt that out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did. You did taunt him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He is a dipshit. Before he does his cantrip, I'm going to go, you can go ahead and live forever, but you'll still be fucking ugly the whole damn time! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Disadvantage because you're prone on the ground and it's a ranged attack. That is a two plus 16. That is an 18.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: To my armor class? He doesn't hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I rolled a natural 20 and a two, by the way, so if you weren't prone?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He would have--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Destroyed me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You would be dust.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now it's Vecna's turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Now. (laughs) Now?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That wasn't his turn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was a legendary action.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't want any of it!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: None of us want this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't want it! I don't like it!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't even want to play.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Taryon's back in Whitestone having a fucking ball.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Taryon's sitting with a cup of tea.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, Taryon's on the floor, weeping, holding his necklace.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He doesn't know who it is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We've got one way down. We are all having the thumpa-thumpa right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's red. All flashing red.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Why did you say okay that way?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Liam can be Taryon now! (laughs)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're terrible.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No! It's an established character we already have artwork for. Why let it go to waste? He's done prissy boys before.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Look at Matt's face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vecna's going to lean down, seeing that you just brought life back to Vex--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't you do it!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Matthew, don't do it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Join your friend."

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: No!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We will not go quietly into the night!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't hurt me no more. Counterspell!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a 7th-level Finger of Death.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that a natural 20?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Scanlan! No!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What is this up and down cardiac arrrest game?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural one?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Stop rolling that die.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And you're below 100?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It really is a one?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It really was a one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can add things to it, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, you can't.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 7d8. I need you to make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I make a constitution saving throw? Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're still inspired.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're inspired!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: "You're spired!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Inspired. Use it!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a d10, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: d12 on top of that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you roll?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Plus the inspiration.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, just the 13. Plus-- 19?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. You take 67 points of necrotic damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It wasn't Power Word Kill, it was Finger of Death?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Remember, he's not a god yet.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just the one. Just the one Power Word Kill.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The fact that he's not a god gives me diarrhea feelings.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, and he's going to move back a bit, frustrated at the--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: At everything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At your attempts to Counterspell. Actually, no. He laughed at that. "Nice try."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It wasn't my best performance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Delilah's out. Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a stealth check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cool. Right. Pass Without a Trace is still going, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hello?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're there, Grog, you hear (screeching). A cloud of screeches, as about nine of these gloom stalkers all start (whoosh) going into a dive towards you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mistoffelees.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mr. Mistoffelees, come back!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Am I going to do anything? How far away is the nearest structure?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing. It's a crater. You're where the city used to be. You have at least a mile to each side of nothing but crater.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fuck!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He's all by his lonesome!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One more round.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He doesn't know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He could be stuck there forever!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's nothing we can do right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to go into a frenzied rage, and I'm going to use my second wind to heal 1d10 plus my fighter level. Three, six. Six points, yay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How close to you do we have to be?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We have to be touching.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And you have to not be wind.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can be wind now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't have any fighter things, so that's my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Four undead pop up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're bullshit. We don't care.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: High armor. You're ducking out of the way. The skeleton is (tink) hitting the ground. It's also attacking at you, Pike. That's cocked. Natural one. It goes to strike you, and it doesn't even hit you. The holy symbol of Sarenrae flares, and it (raspy cry) pulls away from the blast of vibrant, radiant energy. There's going to be one attacking you, Scanlan. That is a 20 to hit?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You take eight points of slashing damage. And attacking you, Percival, that's another 20.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That is my armor class.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It hits you. You take 11 points of slashing damage as it cuts through you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am definitely not amused.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What was the name of that one city, you guys?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where is your dad from?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Syngorn. Is Syngorn still in the Feywild?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Damn it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where did we go? What city in the Feywild did we go to?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can go to the pond.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The death knight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Steps forward, seeing Scanlan attempt to shrug off all these spells, comes rushing forward, and you watch as its blade begins to empower this dark, black shadow, similar to the gloom stalkers you've seen before. As he brings the sword and arcs it down with tremendous might, you hear the crack of thunder as this Staggering Smite slams into you, or tries to, at least.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That sounds bad.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's bad. Do you have a reaction?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I used it already.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Shitty roll. 16 to hit?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah, that hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think I'm not attuned-- yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take ten points of slashing damage, plus 17 points of necrotic damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And as part of the Staggering Smite, you also take 14 points of psychic damage, and make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Against magic? That's better. 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17? His spell DC is 18, unfortunately. On a failed save, you have a disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks, and you can't take reactions until the end of your next turn, so you can't Counterspell.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Scanlan's getting whaled on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Disadvantage on all attack rolls?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, but that's a concentration spell, so he's not going to maintain the concentration. You take the damage, and he lets it go. You don't have a disadvantage. Otherwise, he would lose other bits of concentration.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Other bits of concentration.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so that brings us to Vex. Your turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughing) I get to go?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Sorry!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're alive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry, guys. You walked into the lion's den.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yeah, we did.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I never did a single thing in this fight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I stand up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If we're smart--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can bring you back.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm heading towards where you are. I'm heading towards the deceased body of Delilah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to, as a bonus action, down my biggest healing potion, which is one greater healing potion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's also a superior healing potion lying on the ground amongst all my shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. It's in your armor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Greater is 4d4 plus four.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, it's something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 13 plus four is 17 healing points, and I'm going to move closer to Keyleth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She can move to us. Never mind.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We have to all be holding hands, y'all.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I put myself in between Percy and Keyleth so I can reach my hand out?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to be making a beeline for everybody else. Everybody's in that big clump.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're all in a clump, so we can still touch? I don't need to move anywhere in order to be able to touch her?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You'll be able to move before you cast Plane Shift, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So as long as we're all touching, she can get to us. We just need to clump, and I move last, so I'm fine. Is that right? Yeah, I move last.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth moves last. Keyleth and Scanlan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to shoot at the death knight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: With my 21?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21 actually hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: With my Blazing Bowstring, and I want to make it a bramble shot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hit him hard.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is anybody standing next to him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan and Keyleth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sweet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Feel free to hit me. I don't care. I can't be grappled.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Doesn't matter. She just gets extra points--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, he's flanked.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 11 additional, so that's--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, and the Blazing Bowstring. Six additional from that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks up at you and you watch as flames (fire noises) burn out of the armor. The arrow burns away, and the brambles ignite and fafll to ash around him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not surprising. What about his concentration?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Come on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to be... half of 56? Oh man, he's going to have to roll really high.

lines.name: TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hold on. Half of 56 is--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the flames ignite and burn around, the impact still causes him to lose the spell, and you watch as a vacuum fills, and Grog, just as you see this barrage of gloom stalkers, ready to grab and tear you apart, you (poof) out and then (whoosh) appear in that space where you once were.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Huh?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Grog! You're back!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Grog, we've got to get out!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that ends your turn, Vex?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I get to attack him again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're in a nice little clump, aren't we?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That one definitely hits. This is way less damage. 20 damage on the second one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. You can sense there's shadow and smoke pouring out from under the armor as the frustration of lost concentration is there. The second arrow hits the shoulder. Staring straight at you, angrily.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keyleth, get us out of here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hold hands.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we're all in physical contact, at this point, except for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends Vex's turn?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where's Vax?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well...

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll talk later!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Working on it. Do you have all of his stuff?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As much as I can carry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Armor, daggers. Roll an investigation check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Dust?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Boots, his voice says from beyond the grave.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get most of his important magical items.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And dust.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And a little bit of dust.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Those boots are gone!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Next time we fight Vecna, he's going to be wearing some very nice boots.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm kidding.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He'll be Finger of Deathing me double-time.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Are we trying to get out of here? What are we doing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We are trying to get out of here.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But then what?! We still have to fight him!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but then we'll be able to recover a little bit and figure out what we're doing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to die here.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Keyleth's doing it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: As long as we're all touching, it doesn't matter where Keyleth is, but Turn Undead would help, maybe?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or heal us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Healing or Turn Undead.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: When's your turn up?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm coming up, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And you're holding your action, Keyleth?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, after Pike's turn.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to do Mass Cure Wounds at 6th level. Let's see.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is actually proving to be invaluable.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's very handy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What? What did you just think of?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nothing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Later. We need a bigger boat.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Fuck, this is a bad roll.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is this a new round since my last Counterspell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What was the last one you countered and failed? That was on Vecna's turn, so when it comes back to your turn, it will be.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not yet.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: 26 points. I rolled so badly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 26 is great.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And then... am I able to also, at this point, see if I can channel divinity?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's an action to do that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Sorry. I'm so hot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's what I say to myself every morning.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Your extensions look good, but I feel like that is...

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. I'm just hanging out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That's Pike's turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we all holding hands? Are we all in position?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, did you just cure our wounds?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, we just got 26 points back.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait. Can I do a Mass Healing Word as my bonus action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What level? No, because you already did a higher-level. You can't do that, unfortunately.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can do it to one person.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll do one person. Who's closest to me?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's probably at the bottom.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Let me do the Healing Word.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're nothing! You're nobody!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You'll never mean nothing in this world!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the end of your turn, Pike, Vecna's going to go ahead and cast-- you hear the voice enter your mind once more, Pike. "Don't worry. If you love her that much, I'll send her to you." Make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no, dexterity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let me see if it's dexterity or constitution. Let me check real fast.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's he doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's trying to hurt our Pikey.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a dexterity. Make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I knew it was too low.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You take 78 points of force damage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How much?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: 78. Okay. That is okay. I'm unconscious--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, if it brings you to zero, it turns you to dust.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But her armor!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But the armor.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It never got her to zero.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As soon as you hit zero, the armor flickers in, and the divine--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Which also means that all the fucking skeletons take damage!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. As the ray hits you and you feel your flesh begin to dissipate, the blessing of Pelor and the guidance of Sarenrae flicker into you, and you watch as light and flames (explosion noise) burst out of her like a Doctor regenerating. As the fire consumes the area, roll your damage for your armor. Thank you for reminding me of that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Plate of the Dawnmartyr, you guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was about to say, I know the stats of the Dawnmartyr really well right now, for reasons.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They take 6d6 fire damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 6d6 fire damage!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The ones within melee.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To all hostile creatures, correct?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not all creatures?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All hostile.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a very important distinction.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was terrible!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: 14. You know what? It's fine. I'm alive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That brings us to Percy.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Nothing is going well!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are we a reasonable chain?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we're just waiting on you to make the touch.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's nobody breaking the chain? I'm going to move six points in the direction of Delilah because I'm going to bring her with me because I don't want that dead body there. Do I make it in six moves? And while I'm running, just for fucking fun, I'm going to take three shots at that armor, and I'm going to push him the fuck back, if that's okay. I'm going to push that knight back. I'm going to try and do a force push.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And you're saving your action until we're all touching?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. It's about to be. We're all touching. Let's get rid of that fucker.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We are getting out of here, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're getting the fuck out of here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I thought you were saving your action.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I rolled a really fucking shitty initiative.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a 27 to hit? The knight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits, yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, and that's a torso push. I'm only going to take the one shot. I don't even care anymore; I'm just pushing him away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's pushed ten feet?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's pushed ten feet back from my position.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does he make a save for that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's no save for that, and then he takes a disturbingly sad nine points of damage, plus six points psychic damage. But he's ten feet back. We're all touching. I'm going to save the rest of my attack for anybody who tries to get in the way of this shit. If anybody interrupts us, I've got two more shots ready to go. Also burning a heal for fun, as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will Lightning Bolt at level four the armor knight guy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm also holding onto Delilah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I love you so much.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll lift up my leg a little bit. Squeeze it out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Like a dog at a fire hydrant.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's 8d6, but at level four it's 9d6, I think?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Level four, it's 9d6, yeah. He did not make his save. He rolled a nine plus six. 15.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yay! I'm not quite at full.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He has advantage on his saves against magical effects and spells. He rolled worse.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 35 points of damage. The bolt (lightning noise) through him at the same time he's blasted back by Percy's hit and skids. You see the smoke rise up. Like the Terminator, he keeps moving forward.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll use my movement to gather whatever bits of Vax I can still see.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Put your hands in it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And get into "posish."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're ready to burn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will bonus action Healing Word Pikey-poo, which is for me-- what is Healing Word? It's 2d4 plus six?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
