lines.text: At the end of Scanlan's turn--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fuck no!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're adults.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is this game, Matthew? Don't do it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He is going to take a shot at Pike with a Firebolt cantrip.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You have a reaction.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I do, but I want to save it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Bob and weave. I can bob and weave.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's no save. This is it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do people have to be alive to get out of here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a 21. What's your armor class?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It doesn't even hit!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Eat a dick!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Eat a bag of dicks!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: At level five?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I rolled a five. It's a cantrip. It fires the bolt towards you; you're barely holding on. As you turn around, the flame hits you, but your armor absorbs it. No impact. Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I need Taco Bell right now in my life!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I know. I want Taco Bell so bad. We might have cheats tonight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's the end of Scanlan's turn. Keyleth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we all here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're all here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're all sure about this? We're out? 100%?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're dying.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, let's stay and fight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're on this plane, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we're on the material plane.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then we're going to the Feywild! And we all hold hands--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you turning back to your form, then?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, I drop form and I pull out my tuning fork and my flowers, and I think deep about the Gilded Run and the Shademirk Bog and the beautiful pond that we appeared around, that we know there's a portal right near it. That's what I think about strongly, and I say, everyone think about the pretty ponds!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Feywild Spring Break, motherfuckers!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Spring Break 2017, Feywild!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Roll. You're a good man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vecna's going to attempt to Counterspell.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I knew that's what you were waiting for!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was some old-school Magic: The Gathering shit, right there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do it, Scanlan. Do it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're not happy yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Let me check real fast. I need to confirm this real fast.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan's back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shorthalt's back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "I'd rather not use it."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, no. The only spell he even had left to Counterspell was 7th level. Yeah, (poof).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the glyph of shattering begins to coalesce around his fingers in one hand and the wrist on the other, you strike up a Counterspell of your own.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. I will say to him, this time-- I've got nothing left. I will sing to him, (singing) I'm beautiful. I'm beautiful, it's true. You saw my face in a crowded place, and you didn't know what to do because I just took a shit on you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Before (spell noise) you are all yanked through a familiar tunnel of darkness and then thrust out into the center of a clustered, dense forest in the Feywild.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh god. Have I been there? Wait, was that me? Yes. Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm sorry. I would have taken us home, but we were already there, and I had to go somewhere else.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where's Vax?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (fake crying) You sadistic motherfucker! You cut it right there?! I was okay until right then!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's not nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm so sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nothing feels good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was okay until right then!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Let's do one more hour.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was amazing. That was brutal. We didn't have a fucking chance.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, there was not a fucking prayer.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What else were we going to do? Set up an Orange Julius stand by that tower? Of course we were going to go into that tower.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Of course! But we didn't know how fucked we were until we got up there. We had to go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought that we were pretty badass when we took the tower down, and we were not.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can get you back, man. I can get you fucking back!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you? Without a body?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're going to have some discussions.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Without a body?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But True Resurrection says I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thanks for kicking in for a taste of the final arc. Holy shit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You know what, I'm grateful that we're not--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You would have come back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And we would have been gone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I would have to have won the game all by myself.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Which you've already done.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or I would have taken the Deck and been like--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is true.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If he can't move, he's fucked.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Boots no longer.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can't believe I fucking dumped my 9th-level spell in you, and then you got tied down. It made zero fucking difference.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You did great.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We both wasted our fucking 9th-level spells.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're hard to use. We've got to learn to use them better.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've got one chance to do something fucking amazing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Vecna is out and ready to fucking destroy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll pick up on this next week.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow. I'm shaking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Have a wonderful night. We'll see you soon, and is it Thursday yet?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope! It's Thursday right now!

lines.name: LIAM
